Terms of Use

These terms outline how you may use the Green Orbit Digital website, services, and content.

Effective Date: 11 November 2025

1. Who We Are

Green Orbit Digital Ltd (“we”, “our”, “us”) is a private limited company registered in England and Wales (Company No. 15207389). Our registered office is located at DOCK – Space City, 75 Exploration Drive, Leicester LE4 5NU. We operate this website (www.greenorbit.space) and provide sustainable marketing and digital consultancy services to clients worldwide.

2. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please stop using the website immediately.

3. Scope of Use

These Terms govern your access to and use of our website, including all information, tools, content, and services made available through it. Additional terms may apply to specific services or engagements, such as proposals, workshops, or hosted audits—these will take precedence where relevant.

4. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

5. Professional Advice Disclaimer

The content on this website, including sustainability insights, guides, and resources, is for general informational purposes only. It should not be interpreted as professional advice. For bespoke sustainability or digital strategy support, please contact our consultancy team for a tailored engagement.

6. Account Security

If you access a client portal or collaboration platform through Green Orbit Digital, you are responsible for safeguarding your login credentials. Do not share passwords or access tokens with unauthorised parties. We are not liable for loss or damage resulting from your failure to secure your account.

7. Acceptable Use

You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes. You must not:

  • Post or transmit unlawful, defamatory, or harmful content.
  • Attempt to gain unauthorised access to our systems or data.
  • Use automated bots or scraping tools to collect data.
  • Upload or distribute malicious code, viruses, or similar software.

We reserve the right to restrict, suspend, or terminate your access if you breach these conditions.

8. Intellectual Property

All intellectual property rights in the website’s design, branding, and content (including text, images, code, and downloadable resources) belong to Green Orbit Digital Ltd or our licensors. You may view, download, or print materials for personal or internal business use only. Reproduction or redistribution for commercial purposes requires prior written permission.

9. Third-Party Links

Our site may contain links to third-party websites or platforms (e.g., Notion, HubSpot, Stripe). These links are provided for convenience only. We do not endorse or control these external sites and accept no responsibility for their content or privacy practices.

10. Limitation of Liability

While we make reasonable efforts to ensure our website is accurate and available, Green Orbit Digital is not liable for any loss or damage resulting from website downtime, inaccuracies, or unauthorised access to your data. This limitation does not exclude liability for death, personal injury, or fraud.

11. Indemnity

You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Green Orbit Digital and its directors, employees, and affiliates from any claims, losses, or damages arising from your misuse of our website or breach of these Terms.

12. Governing Law

These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of England and Wales. Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of England and Wales.

13. Contact Information

For questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at:

Green Orbit Digital Ltd
DOCK – Space City
75 Exploration Drive
Leicester LE4 5NU, United Kingdom
Email: hello@greenorbit.space

Contact Us
Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
